abstract: The soda industry offers to make a donation to the Pew Charitable Trusts if the city of Philadelphia skips a soda tax, according to reports.
snippet: The soda industry offers to make a donation to the Pew Charitable Trusts if the city of Philadelphia skips a soda tax, according to reports.
lead_paragraph: Here, via The Supermarket Guru, comes one of the more entertaining examples of the Coca-Cola and PepsiCo offering to do whatever it takes to defeat a soda tax:

headline.main: A $10 Million Offer From the Soda People
